entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
